Class TabuProblemInfo

  edu.sru.thangiah.zeus.metaheuristics.tabu.TabuProblemInfo
public class TabuProblemInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Title: TabuSearch - a Meta-Heuristic for the Zeus System

Description: Global user-defined parameters for use in tabu search.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Field Detail

maxTabuIterations

public static int maxTabuIterations
Maximum number of iterations permitted by Tabu Search. After this number of iterations has exceeded, any more calls to isTabu(..) method of TabuSearch will return true, even if called with a valid operation. Also after this number of iterations have been exceeded, the following parameter 'STOP' will be set to true.

maxTabuIterationsWithNoChange

public static int maxTabuIterationsWithNoChange
Maximum number of iterations that will be allowed where no change occurs to current solution. Change is defined as any difference in total cost of the current solution in Zeus. Change could be for better or worse. When exceeded, any more calls to isTabu(..) in TabuSearch will return true, and the following STOP parameter will be set to true.

STOP

public static boolean STOP
An optimization should check when to stop by checking the value of 'STOP'.

maxOperationsInMemoryPerTruck

public static int maxOperationsInMemoryPerTruck
Maximum number of operations remembered by one truck.

lifetime

public static int lifetime
Life of a tabu operation specified as a number of iterations. The operations are only considered tabu for this many iterations. Having too short a lifetime, may cause the optimization technique to go into a loop, as the operations are not considered tabu for long enough.

tabuThreshold

public static float tabuThreshold
The percentage by which a given solution may deviate from the current solution (in Zeus) in terms of cost or other constaints, if necessary.

useDeviatedThreshold

public static boolean useDeviatedThreshold
Indicates whether the Tabu Threshold is deviated (as determined necessary by Tabu Search) or whether it is kept constant through the whole search.

tempFileLocation

public static java.lang.String tempFileLocation
Folder for creating temporary files. IT MUST EXIST AND USER MUST HAVE WRITE ACCESS!!!

TabuProblemInfo

public TabuProblemInfo()
